-- | Deserialize things with cereal and enumerator
--   
--   Deserialize things with cereal and enumerator
@package cereal-enumerator
@version 0.3.1

module Data.Serialize.Get.Enumerator
newtype ParseError
ParseError :: String -> ParseError

-- | Convert a <a>Get</a> to an <a>Iteratee</a>. The resulting
--   <a>Iteratee</a> may fail with a <a>ParseError</a>.
iterGet :: Monad m => Get a -> Iteratee ByteString m a
instance Typeable ParseError
instance Show ParseError
instance Exception ParseError
